title: TUESDAY - The Steelers no longer perfect 2020
itunes:title: TUESDAY - The Steelers no longer perfect 2020
description:
Monday night was unkind to the Steelers (0:06) as they fall to the Washington Football Team, ending their undefeated season. Alex Smith talks about his incredible comeback and enjoying every minute of it (0:51). In the other Monday Night Matchup Josh Allen and the Bills knocked off the 49ers (2:00). The Ravens getting the reigning NFL MVP back (3:01) as they get set to take on the Cowboys in a Tuesday night showdown. Plus, the Jets shake up their coaching staff (3:30) after a heartbreaking loss to the Raiders

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
